title: K&N Engine Air Filter for Honda Civic - High Performance, Washable and Reusable
description: Upgrade your Honda Civic with the K&N Engine Air Filter, designed for high performance and superior protection. This air filter features a multi-layered filtration media that captures more dirt and debris while allowing a high volume of air to flow into the engine. The high-flow design improves engine efficiency, resulting in increased horsepower and better acceleration. Easy to install, this filter is also washable and reusable, providing long-lasting performance with regular maintenance. The K&N Engine Air Filter is a perfect choice for those looking to enhance their vehicle's performance and ensure a clean, efficient engine operation. Fits most 2016-2021 Honda Civic models.
key_features: High-performance air filter for Honda Civic
Washable and reusable for lifetime use
meta_title: K&N Engine Air Filter for Honda Civic - High Performance, Washable & Reusable
meta_description: Buy K&N Engine Air Filter for Honda Civic for high performance and superior engine protection. Multi-layered filtration media, high-flow design, washable and reusable. Fits most 2016-2021 Honda Civic models.

title: K&N Engine Air Filter for Honda Civic - Premium Quality, High Airflow

Perfect for 2016-2021 Honda Civic models, the K&N Engine Air Filter delivers excellent performance and reliability for your vehicle’s needs.
